text: McAllister's Deli is an American chain of fast casual restaurants. It was founded in 1989 in Oxford, Mississippi, by retired dentist Dr. Don Newcomb. It has 500 locations. The menu includes deli sandwiches, "giant spuds", soups, salads, and desserts, as well as catering items such as sandwich trays and boxed lunches. Category:American fast food restaurants Category:1989 establishments in the United States
title: McAllister's Deli
